languages.text: {n}Руолдо сцепляет руки и покорно произносит:{/n} "Разумеется, господин судья, я предоставлю вам все документы, как только наша внутренняя проверка завершится. Уверяю, это не займет много времени, а сама отчетность будет исчерпывающей!"

{n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"
languages.original_text: {n}Руолдо сцепляет руки и покорно произносит:{/n} "Разумеется, господин судья, я предоставлю вам все документы, как только наша внутренняя проверка завершится. Уверяю, это не займет много времени, а сама отчетность будет исчерпывающей!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judge, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the reporting itself will be exhaustive!"

{n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judge, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the reporting itself will be exhaustive!"

{n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judge, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the reporting itself will be exhaustive!"

{n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

{n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo verschränkt die Hände und sagt ergeben:{/n} "Natürlich, Meister Judikator, ich werde Euch alle Dokumente übergeben, sobald unsere interne Begutachtung abgeschlossen ist. Ich versichere Euch, es wird nicht lange dauern, und der Bericht selbst wird umfassend sein!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo verschränkt die Hände und sagt ergeben:{/n} "Natürlich, Meister Richter, ich werde Euch alle Dokumente übergeben, sobald unsere interne Begutachtung abgeschlossen ist. Ich versichere Euch, es wird nicht lange dauern, und der Bericht selbst wird umfassend sein!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo joint les mains et s'exprime d'un ton servile :{/n} « Bien sûr, maître-juge, je vous communiquerai tous les documents dès que notre enquête interne sera terminée. Ce ne sera pas long, et le rapport sera aussi complet que possible ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo joint les mains et s'exprime d'un ton servile :{/n} « Bien sûr, maître-juge, je vous communiquerai tous les documents dès que notre enquête interne sera terminée. Ce ne sera pas long, et le rapport sera aussi complet que possible ! »

languages.text: {n}罗尔多双手合十，恭顺地开了口。{/n}“当然没问题，法务官大人。等内部审核结束之后，我马上就把所有文件都给您拿来。我可以向您保证，这个过程用不了多长时间。您想要的所有细节，报告上都写得清清楚楚！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}罗尔多双手合十，恭顺地开了口。{/n}“当然没问题，法务官大人。等内部审核结束之后，我马上就把所有文件都给您拿来。我可以向您保证，这个过程用不了多长时间。您想要的所有细节，报告上都写得清清楚楚！”
{n}罗尔多双手合十，恭顺地开了口。{/n}“当然没问题，法务官大人。等内部审核结束之后，我马上就把所有文件都给您拿来。我可以向您保证，这个过程用不了多长时间。您想要的所有细节，报告上都写得清清楚楚！”

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo une las manos y dice con docilidad:{/n} «Por supuesto, maestro magistrado, le proporcionaré todos los documentos en cuanto completemos la revisión interna. ¡Le aseguro que no llevará mucho tiempo y que el informe será exhaustivo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo une las manos y dice con docilidad:{/n} «Por supuesto, maestro juez, le proporcionaré todos los documentos en cuanto completemos la revisión interna. ¡Le aseguro que no llevará mucho tiempo y que el informe será exhaustivo!».

languages.text: {n}ルオルドは両手を組み合わせて控えめに言う。{/n}「もちろんです、裁判官様。内部査定が完了次第、すべての書類をお渡しします。時間がかからないことはお約束します。報告書自体も詳細なものにします！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドは両手を組み合わせて控えめに言う。{/n}「もちろんです、裁判官様。内部査定が完了次第、すべての書類をお渡しします。時間がかからないことはお約束します。報告書自体も詳細なものにします！」
{n}ルオルドは両手を組み合わせて控えめに言う。{/n}「もちろんです、裁判官様。内部査定が完了次第、すべての書類をお渡しします。時間がかからないことはお約束します。報告書自体も詳細なものにします！」

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo, el pençe divan durarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Elbette sayın Hâkim... İç denetimimiz biter bitmez size tüm belgeleri ileteceğim. Bu sürecin tez zamanda tamamlanacağına ve raporun da son derece kapsamlı olacağını temin ederim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo clasps his hands together and says meekly,{/n} "Of course, Master Judicator, I will provide you with all the documents as soon as our internal review is complete. I assure you it won't take long, and the report itself will be exhaustive!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruoldo, el pençe divan durarak konuşur:{/n} "Elbette, Sayın Hâkim... İç denetimimiz biter bitmez size tüm belgeleri ileteceğim. Bu sürecin tez zamanda tamamlanacağına ve raporun da son derece kapsamlı olacağını temin ederim!"
